name: docpad-plugin-cleanurls
description: Adds support for clean urls to DocPad
readme:
# Clean URLs Plugin for DocPad Adds support for clean URLs to [DocPad](https://github.com/bevry/docpad) ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-cleanurls ``` ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
